short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sorare NBA Jet - Injury report, stats and projections for better choices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SorareNbaJet is an extension for Google Chrome that adds functionality to Sorare, a fantasy basketball game (www.sorare.com).
This addon adds cards price, injury information, stats and projections for NBA players.
This will allow you to optimize your choices to avoid picking injured players, and help you for player scouting.

Posted on:
- The list of your cards
- Past, current and future lobby
- When composing your team
- On the auction market and manager sales
- On the player sheet
- On the squad roster
- On manager page
- On offers page

Information: 
All data added by this extension comes from SorareNbaJet website.
